blogPost.title: U.S. employers added 390,000 jobs in May, beating many economists’ expectations and extending a yearslong streak of strong gains in the labor market #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/wcYuNSy6sZ https://t.co/9rHaf7uals
blogPost.author: The Wall Street Journal

localize.full_text: 5月の米雇用者数は39万人増で、多くのエコノミストの予想を上回り、労働市場の力強い上昇の数年連続を延長 #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/wcYuNSy6sZ https://t.co/9rHaf7uals
美国雇主在5月份增加了39万个工作岗位，超过了许多经济学家的预期，延长了劳动力市场一年来的强劲增长#WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/wcYuNSy6sZ https://t.co/9rHaf7uals
美國僱主在5月份增加了39萬個工作崗位，超過了許多經濟學家的預期，延長了勞動力市場一年來的強勁增長#WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/wcYuNSy6sZ https://t.co/9rHaf7uals

previous.title: Actor Johnny Depp was awarded $10.4 million in his case against Amber Heard in Virginia, while the actor’s former wife will receive $2 million in compensatory damages #WSJWhatsNow breaks down the numbers https://t.co/4c7FMFsjov https://t.co/pscTVQOMrs

localize.full_text: 俳優のジョニー・デップがバージニア州でアンバー・ハードとの裁判で1040万ドルを獲得、俳優の元妻は200万ドルの賠償金を受け取る #WSJWhatsNow breaks down the numbers https://t.co/4c7FMFsjov https://t.co/pscTVQOMrs
演员约翰尼-德普在弗吉尼亚州起诉安柏-赫德的案件中获得了1040万美元的赔偿，而该演员的前妻将获得200万美元的赔偿金#WSJWhatsNow对这些数字进行了分析 https://t.co/4c7FMFsjov https://t.co/pscTVQOMrs
演員約翰尼-德普在弗吉尼亞州起訴安柏-赫德的案件中獲得了1040萬美元的賠償，而該演員的前妻將獲得200萬美元的賠償金#WSJWhatsNow對這些數字進行了分析 https://t.co/4c7FMFsjov https://t.co/pscTVQOMrs

next.title: Heavy rains ravaged Yellowstone National Park and forced visitors to evacuate just as the summer tourism season was underway #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/MavGwS7s80 https://t.co/HqNzeizPQB

localize.full_text: 夏の観光シーズンを迎えたイエローストーン国立公園が大雨に見舞われ、観光客が避難を余儀なくされた #WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/MavGwS7s80 https://t.co/HqNzeizPQB
大雨肆虐黄石国家公园，迫使游客疏散，而此时正值夏季旅游旺季#WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/MavGwS7s80 https://t.co/HqNzeizPQB
大雨肆虐黃石國家公園，迫使遊客疏散，而此時正值夏季旅遊旺季#WSJWhatsNow https://t.co/MavGwS7s80 https://t.co/HqNzeizPQB
